name: filebin
title: Filebin
description: Easily manage your FileBin uploads and bins directly within Raycast. Create, upload, download, lock, and delete bins and files with just a few clicks. Simplify file handling with a clean and intuitive interface!
author: eliasthecactus

commands.name: filebin
commands.title: Filebin Manager
commands.subtitle: Easily manage your bins and files
commands.description: Filebin Manager allows you to view, add, and remove bins, as well as manage files within them. Keep your file storage organized with ease.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
